depositRates.additionalInfo: The rate will vary depending upon the currency pair and interest tiers involved.

fees.name: Account Keeping Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A six-monthly fee of A$50 applies to your FCACD  account each March 31 and September 30, if the  minimum balance over that period is less than  A$100,000 equivalent

description: An everyday account denominated in a foreign currency
name: Foreign Currency At Call Deposit Account

constraints.additionalInfo: A Foreign Currency Account can only be maintained if an existing Australian dollar  account is held in the same name / title.
constraints.additionalValue: The relevant foreign currency has equivalent of A$10,000.00 on the day of opening. At discretion, the bank may accept lower amounts.

features.additionalInfo: At call account denominated in a foreign currency provided you do so prior to the relevant "cut off time" for the applicable currency otherwise it will be the next business day.
